'Solitude' is a state of seclusion or isolation, i.e., lack of contact with
people. It may stem from bad relationships, deliberate choice, infectious
disease, mental disorders, neurological disorders or circumstances of employment
or situation (see castaway).

Short-term solitude is often valued as a time when one may work, think or rest
without being disturbed. It may be desired for the sake of privacy.

created the word loneliness to express the pain of being alone. And it has
